cz.cvut.fel.pjv.simulation.network.server

Class SimulationServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.pjv.simulation.network.server.SimulationServer

  • public class SimulationServer
extends java.lang.Object
    SimulationServer. keeps record of all connected clients and calculates responses.

      • listen

        public void listen()
        listen for client connections until simulationserver gives command to clients to go. or as long as there are less than maximum allowed clients connected

      • findCoordinatesRelativeToTarget

        public int[] findCoordinatesRelativeToTarget(int minX,
                                             int minY,
                                             int globalX,
                                             int globalY)
        This method finds coordinates relative to target connection In client communication message, there is information about global coordinates. First connection must be found to get minX and minY
        Parameters:
        minX - is global minimumX coordinate of target conneciton
        minY - is global minimumY coordinate of target conneciton
        globalX - is global x coordinate of block
        globalY - is global y coordinate of block
        Returns:
        relativeX and relativeY

      • findConnectionByMinimumCoordinateValues

        public SimulationServerThread findConnectionByMinimumCoordinateValues(int minX,
                                                                      int minY)
        in table, connection is identified by minX and minY parameters. this iterates through table and finds fitting connection
        Parameters:
        minX - is minX coordinate of connection
        minY - is minY coordinate of connection
        Returns:
        the connection

        public void setStateOfConnection(SimulationServerThread connection,
                                 java.lang.String state)

        Parameters:

        state - is the state

      • setBlocksOfConnection

        public void setBlocksOfConnection(SimulationServerThread connection,
                                  Block[][] blocks)
        update blocks of connection so view can paint it
        Parameters:
        connection - is the connection whose blocks belong to
        blocks - are the blocks to be set

      • set

        public void set()
        if every connection is in state ready, send STATE SET to every connection, so that server receives update blocks back

      • go

        public void go()
        if every connection is in STATE SET, send GO command to every connection

      • stopInitStartSimulating

        public void stopInitStartSimulating()
